attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All benefits should be scraped. Those who won't or don't want to work should be forced to leave the country. Any form of benefit should only be there for people that are totally incapacitated, not people who think they are. There are people receiving incapacity benefits walking the street and living in the pubs or down the bookies or dealing drugs. Make them all work for any benefit. They could clean the streets or scrub off grafitti or even help the older generation. Don't just give them handouts without any incentive

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
